title: Models scales are wrong after teleport in Gazebo replays

content.raw:
This is specially bad because we are trying to reproduce replays of automated tests that failed task 3. This tests perform a teleport before proceeding to complete the task.

Simulation of the replay hangs completely shortly after if I try to browse around.

In case it helps, this is the console output:

```
[ INFO] [1495879806.210197483]: Finished loading Gazebo ROS API Plugin.
[ INFO] [1495879806.210551586]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
[ INFO] [1495879808.079459680]: Camera Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.079554459]: Camera Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.082155605]: Camera Plugin (ns = /)  <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.082464084]: Camera Plugin (ns = /)  <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.089135566]: Laser Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.089195213]: Starting GazeboRosLaser Plugin (ns = /)!
[ INFO] [1495879808.098933673]: GPU Laser Plugin (ns = /) <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.099753808]: LoadThread function completed
libdc1394 error: Failed to initialize libdc1394
[ INFO] [1495879808.388378087, 0.022000000]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] is now available.
[ INFO] [1495879808.407637684, 0.025000000]: Physics dynamic reconfigure ready.
[libprotobuf ERROR google/protobuf/message_lite.cc:123] Can't parse message of type "gazebo.msgs.Publish" because it is missing required fields: msg_type, host, port
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'

```
content.html:
This is specially bad because we are trying to reproduce replays of automated tests that failed task 3. This tests perform a teleport before proceeding to complete the task.

Simulation of the replay hangs completely shortly after if I try to browse around.

In case it helps, this is the console output:

[ INFO] [1495879806.210197483]: Finished loading Gazebo ROS API Plugin.
[ INFO] [1495879806.210551586]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
[ INFO] [1495879808.079459680]: Camera Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.079554459]: Camera Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.082155605]: Camera Plugin (ns = /)  <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.082464084]: Camera Plugin (ns = /)  <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.089135566]: Laser Plugin (robotNamespace = /), Info: Using the 'robotNamespace' param: '/'
[ INFO] [1495879808.089195213]: Starting GazeboRosLaser Plugin (ns = /)!
[ INFO] [1495879808.098933673]: GPU Laser Plugin (ns = /) <tf_prefix_>, set to ""
[ INFO] [1495879808.099753808]: LoadThread function completed
libdc1394 error: Failed to initialize libdc1394
[ INFO] [1495879808.388378087, 0.022000000]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] is now available.
[ INFO] [1495879808.407637684, 0.025000000]: Physics dynamic reconfigure ready.
[libprotobuf ERROR google/protobuf/message_lite.cc:123] Can't parse message of type "gazebo.msgs.Publish" because it is missing required fields: msg_type, host, port
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
